title: Marine protected area proposal advances for the Azores
summary: Regional assembly reviews expansion of high-protection zones; stakeholder consultation opens next week.

title: São Miguel freshwater monitoring program releases Q2 data
summary: Diatom indicators suggest early warming signals; program to expand sampling sites in Sete Cidades.

title: EU habitat funding window opens for island restoration
summary: Calls prioritize Natura 2000 and island biodiversity; proposals emphasizing community stewardship encouraged.

title: Regenerative agroforestry pilot expands to Atlantic islands
summary: Syntropic rows trialed with windbreaks and water harvesting on smallholdings; open technical brief released.
